short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assistant for writing texts better, faster and with less errors by providing a personalized autocompletion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Write now with higher throughput and produce less errors, while using the WritingAssistant chrome extension. The extension is your personal assistant, which provides an autocompletion dropdown, while writing texts with support for most web pages and web applications. Simply press the TAB button and your selected autocompletion text will be inserted. Some examples for autocompletion are Confluence, Jira, Gmail, Jupyter Notebooks, Dartpad, DeepL, all pages which use default HTML5 texareas, input fields and contenteditables and many more. 

All stored inputs are only stored locally and not transmitted to any server.
